Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.pet

Class PetService

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.pet.PetService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPetService
@Service public class PetService extends Object implements IPetService
Service class for managing Pet entities. Provides functionality to add, update, delete, and retrieve pet details.

    • deletePet

      @Transactional public void deletePet(Long petId)
      Deletes a pet. Ensures that the last pet of an appointment cannot be deleted.
      Specified by:
      deletePet in interface IPetService
      Parameters:
      petId - the ID of the pet to be deleted
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the pet with the given ID is not found
      PetDeletionNotAllowedException - if the last pet of an appointment is being deleted
